title: Top-5-unknown-facts-about-Varanasi

article.heading: FROG MARRIAGE
paragraph: A very uncommon yet much anticipated ritual of frog marriage is carried out every year on ashwamedha ghat in varanasi. It is particularly done in rainy season to please the rain gods to get abundance of rain

article.heading: SOURCE OF MUSIC
paragraph: Varanasi music tradition is traced back to puranic days.According to Legends hindu god lord shiva is associated with evolving music and dance forms. During the medieval era Varanasi became a thriving center for musicians such as surdas, kabir, ravidas, meera and Tulsidas. In recent times the city is the home to world renowned artists and musicians like Pandit Ravi Shankar and Ustad Bismillah Khan

article.heading: FILM SHOOTING CENTER
paragraph: For quite a while Varanasi has become a center for shooting films and due to its picturesque view.  A few Bollywood movies that were shot here include gangs of wasseypur, shubh mangal zada sawdhan, Ranjhana, piku and super 30. Some parts of the Hollywood movie The Curious case of Benjamin Button were also shot here. Not only hollywood and bollywood but also varanasi has been a hub for bhojpuri movies as well

article.heading: LESSER KNOWN NAMES
paragraph: Although kashi, varanasi, banaras are quite the popular names of this city there are few more lesser known names to add to this list Mahasmasana, Brahma Vardha, Sudarsana and Ramya

article.heading: NAMED AFTER RIVERS
paragraph: The name varanasi itself has a tale of holiness in its origin,the name has been coined from the name of two ganga tributaries forming the city's borders.Varuna flowing in northern varanasi and assi flowing in the southern part of the city
